snippet: The accident brought the number of traffic deaths in the Las Vegas police jurisdiction to 83 this year.
abstract: Driver faces four counts of driving under the influence after his speeding car went airborne and plowed into a Las Vegas bus stop, killing four pedestrians ad injuring eight others; the accident brings the number of traffic deaths in the Las Vegas police jurisdiction to 83 in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The accident brought the number of traffic deaths in the Las Vegas police jurisdiction to 83 this year.

headline.main: Nevada: Driver Faces D.U.I. After 4 Die in Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Driver Faces D.U.I. After 4 Die In Las Vegas
